Title: Goku's Furious Battle Cry! Make It in Time... The Resurrection Wish!
Writer: Takao Koyama, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Tôru Furuya
Plot: After Goku is seemingly defeated by Frieza, Gohan enters the fight to avenge the loss of his father. Meanwhile, a newly resurrected Dende rushes to make a final wish before planet Namek is destroyed.
